greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n!*LaguerreL(n, -5*n).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..250
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Laguerre Polynomial
formula: a(n) = n! * Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(n, k) * 5^k * n^k / k!.
mathematica: Flatten[{1, Table[n!*Sum[Binomial[n, k] * 5^k * n^k / k!, {k, 0, n}], {n, 1, 20}]}]
program: (PARI) for(n=0, 30, print1(n!*sum(k=0, n, binomial(n,k)*5^k*n^k/k!), ", ")) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, May 15 2018
(MAGMA) [Factorial(n)*(&+[Binomial(n,k)*5^k*n^k/Factorial(k): k in [0..n]]): n in [0..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, May 15 2018
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 14 2016
